document.heading: District of Columbia Applications Insurance Implementation Act

history.narrative: Law 1-64, the “District of Columbia Applications Insurance Implementation Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-209, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 27, 1976, and February 24, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 19, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-95 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
